import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Commodity} from "../commodity.model"; @Component({ selector: 'app-commodity-list', templateUrl: './commodity-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./commodity-list.component.css'] }) export class CommodityListComponent implements OnInit{ commodities: Commodity[] = [ new Commodity('商品的名字', '商品的描述', 'https://img0.baidu.com/it/u=3491821198,1069590474&fm=253&fmt=auto&app=138&f=JPEG?w=667&h=500'), new Commodity('商品的名字', '商品的描述', 'https://img0.baidu.com/it/u=3491821198,1069590474&fm=253&fmt=auto&app=138&f=JPEG?w=667&h=500'), new Commodity('商品的名字', '商品的描述', 'https://img0.baidu.com/it/u=3491821198,1069590474&fm=253&fmt=auto&app=138&f=JPEG?w=667&h=500'), ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }

{{ commodity.name }}

{{ commodity.description }}
